title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
---

To add a website icon to the iPhone's home screen, tap the Share button in Safari, then select Add to Home Screen. The Aug. 15 Personal Technology column incorrectly contained an image that showed how to add a website link as a bookmark.

---

Readers can alert The Wall Street Journal to any errors in news articles by e-mailing wsjcontact@wsj.com or by calling 888-410-2667.
